Package fast3d.math.geom

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GeometricObject
    the built-in geometric objects can be analyzed using fast3d.util.RelationshipAnalytics
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Plate
    representing a geometric (infinitely large) plate in 3d space
    a mathematical plate has no thickness or other properties other than it's base position and orientation
    Point
    representing a geometric point (a position in 3d-space)
    a point has no real width or diameter so it is infinitely small - also it has no other properties than it's position (e.g. no color)
    Straight
    representing a geometric (infinitely long) straight line
    a mathematical straight has no end or begin and no thickness and has no other properties than it's position and orientation
